Device configuration for Letv Coolpad Cool1 Dual (International).
=======================================================

Basic   | Spec Sheet
-------:|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CPU     | Octa-core (4x1.4 GHz Cortex-A53 & 4x1.8 GHz Cortex-A72)
CHIPSET | Qualcomm MSM8976 Snapdragon 652
GPU     | Adreno 510
Memory  | 3GB
Shipped Android Version | 6.0.1
Storage | 32GB
Battery | 4000 mAh
Weigth | 167 g (5.89 oz)
Dimensions | 152 x 74.8 x 8.2 mm (5.98 x 2.94 x 0.32 in)
Display | IPS, 1080 x 1920 pixels (~401 ppi pixel density)
Rear Camera  | 13 MP + 13 MP (MONOCHROME) , f/2.0, phase detection autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash
Front Camera | 8 MP, f/2.2, 1.4 Âµm pixel size, 1080p
Release Date | August 2016
